name: Test Game (fuzzmonkey)
description:
Hey Tyrone, here is a demo of the ideas we discussed.  The games resolution is 1920x1280 (so you will have to zoom out, Ctrl+Scroll Down on Chrome)

Use Arrow Keys or WASD to move character around.

Click and move mouse to aim, release to fire.

Character faces left/right based on mouse position, but gun position only changes when left-mouse button is down.
